trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]구현 하는 추적 서비스는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>발생 시키는 인터페이스는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>런타임 추적 인프라에 알리는 이벤트를 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>는 특정 워크플로에 대 한 <xref:System.Type>변경 되었습니다.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 추적 서비스는 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs를 사용 하 여 워크플로 제공 <xref:System.Type>와 새 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>런타임 추적 인프라에.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>발생 시킬 때는 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 받을 때는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>이벤트를 런타임 추적 인프라는 추적 프로필을 지정된 된 워크플로 업데이트 합니다 <xref:System.Type>프로필 캐시에.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>추적 서비스 내부 이벤트 명시적으로 설정 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>하 고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> 발생 시킬 때이 생성자를 사용 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class that specifies a new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> 새 지정 하는 클래스 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> 지정 된 워크플로의 <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>사용 하 여 만든 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>로 지정 된 설정 <xref:System.Type>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>특정된 프로필에 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of workflow for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>있는 워크플로 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> 변경 되었습니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 새 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> 워크플로 형식에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>새 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>워크플로 <xref:System.Type> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> 에 지정 된 내용</xref:System.Type> 에 대 한</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 프로필 캐시를 업데이트 합니다 이벤트</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> 를 받을 때

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> 워크플로 형식에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow whose <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.Type>워크플로 인 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> 업데이트 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>워크플로에 지정 <xref:System.Type>에 추적 프로필 변경 되었습니다.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>추적 프로필을 새로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>새 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> 워크플로에 대 한</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 프로필 캐시를 업데이트 합니다 이벤트</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> 를 받을 때

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>워크플로.</xref:System.Type>
